thread.title: Georgia indicts Confederate flag backers under state terrorism law

title: Georgia indicts Confederate flag backers under state terrorism law
text:
Published By: Reuters - US News - Today 
(Reuters) - More than a dozen supporters of the Confederate flag who clashed with a group of black people attending a child's birthday party...
